title: Basic Medical Procedure Performance Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic medical terminology and awareness of entry-level healthcare systems
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment combining smartphone-based mobile learning and face-to-face practical sessions. PC-based activities are excluded due to limited technological resources.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the steps of five core medical procedures (e.g., blood pressure measurement, blood glucose testing, basic wound care) with 90% accuracy
Learners can demonstrate standard medical procedures in a simulation environment with 80% or higher accuracy
In team-based project assessments, learners can develop and present medical procedure manuals according to a three-stage verification system (accuracy, safety, practicality)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
